In England, in the seven days to 22 June, there were 101,157 new confirmed cases (178.9 new cases per 100,000). In the seven days to 15 June, there were 75,555 new cases and so the new cases have risen by 34% (25,602 extra cases). The number of confirmed COVID-19 cases in England so far as at 27 June is 19,059,682 (33,704 cases per 100,000 population).
